about.1: Jeg er Wessel, en Full Stack Software Engineer passionate about turning ideas into elegant, functional, and impactful digital experiences.
about.2: Med {experience} år erfaring i Software Utvikling, I take pride in being a positive addition to the team, both with a good spirit and high quality code.
about.3: I'm a very big fan of Norway (and Norwegian), and I would love to explore all possibilities to work in Norway - both remote and (preferably) at the office.
